explanation: [0-0] On the upper right side of the screen, a left hand holds a cut loaf of bread with a piece of cooked meat inside. On the upper left, a right hand pinches a bone on the meat. Some other cooked meat can be seen on the left edge of the screen.
[0-3] First, the right hand pinches the bone, lifts it up, and shakes it slightly, separating the bone from the meat.

[3-5] Finally, the camera slowly zooms in, and the right hand removes the bone to the left, letting the meat fall into the bread. The picture freezes above the bread.
